dct_title_s: Map of Clark and Floyd counties, Indiana
dct_description_sm: Prepared for the 5th annual report of Prof. E.T. Cox, State Geologist, 1873 , geology by W.W. Borden. Relief shown by hachures. Shows cities and towns, railroads, Indian mounds, iron ore, stone quarries, hydraulic cement, flour and saw mills, lime kilns, medicinal springs, landings, and fruit farms. Detached from: Geology report. In Fifth annual report of the Geological Survey of Indiana, made in the year 1873. Indianapolis : Sentinel Co., 1874.
Imprint: [Indianapolis] : [Geological Survey of Indiana], [1874]; Imprint: [Indianapolis] : [Sentinel Co., printers], [1874]
Dimensions: on sheet 41 x 49 cm; Scale: Approximately 1:130,000
dct_creator_sm: Cox, E. T. (Edward Travers), 1821-1907; Borden, W. W. (William Wesley), 1823-1906
